Articles.Content:
Not the exact problem. This is happening, but it's only things under the advanced settings won't be read.

Hmmm... I just found a typo that means it won't be able to load the scaled space configs. So it does save the shader floats to the config, just doesn't load them?

Hmmm... I just found a typo that means it won't be able to load the scaled space configs. So it does save the shader floats to the config, just doesn't load them?

Yes, here is a picture to show.

Yes, here is a picture to show.

http://i.imgur.com/9MwFj00.png

Found the culprit Will be fixed in next release.

Found the culprit Will be fixed in next release.

Awesome, now I'm REALLY excited for that release!

Testing out fake shading for my pack, looks surprisingly good.
dose this impact FPS ?

dose this impact FPS ?

Not for me. Though, I have a pretty powerful PC, so my opinion is invalid.

This is only with one texture in use. I think repetition won't be an issue anymore.

EDIT: More rotational angles would help the cause still. Occasional clusters of 2 clouds at the exact same angle do happen.

Edited April 13, 2014 by Astronomer

http://i.imgur.com/R5iizlp.png

This is only with one texture in use. I think repetition won't be an issue anymore.

Daaaaang. That looks amazing. You are a master at this, astro.

... We are all artist. Art is to lie. Art is a lie. In the best of cases, when art is worth, it's a lie to expose the truth.

I see only the truth in beauty;) Seriously though, that's the most quotable thing I've read on these forums. Salute to you.

@Bob, Bobby, Bobbo! aka Astronomer: Those sir, are f'ing dope as high grade heroin. I'd love to feature those on my dream-stream;)

This is the current Duna I'm making in BA. Duna is definitely the hardest atmosphere to realistically capture.

What do you guys think?

Edited April 13, 2014 by Thesonicgalaxy
Not spamming rbrays thread with un needed posts.

I enjoy it.

Sometimes I get the feeling that dirt is not the only thing you sell...

Anyways, I just need to fix those ghost edges... again, and its done. The configs are basically done too, but the advanced settings won't work just yet (distance and stuff).

Hmm.. I'm messing something up.

There's a solid line (curve) of the transition as I'm nearing space -- it may have something to do with the "HD Cloud Improvement" pack I already had installed, but installed "Better Atmospheres" on top of. I wonder if I need to wipe my clouds folder and start over.. :I

Here's a better picture. The effect is as if the top of the sky just opens up to pitch black all of a sudden. Creepy!

Edited April 13, 2014 by Beetlecat
image...

There's a solid line (curve) of the transition as I'm nearing space -- it may have something to do with the "HD Cloud Improvement" pack I already had installed, but installed "Better Atmospheres" on top of. I wonder if I need to wipe my clouds folder and start over.. :I

You need to change the fade distance to 100 manually. It does not save due to a bug in EVE.
